programme.title: The Demon Girl Next Door Ep12
programme.desc: Yuko chases after Momo. In an attempt to make her stay, she proposes for Momo to become her vassal to search for Sakura.

programme.title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records Ep01
programme.desc: Glenn is a lazy guy who prefers to sleep rather than teach. One of his students, Sistine, gets fed up and challenges him to a duel.

programme.title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records Ep02
programme.desc: Even after losing the duel, Glenn still lacks motivation. However, he eventually starts teaching class genuinely to help his students.

programme.title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records Ep03
programme.desc: The evil mages infiltrating the academy are in fact terrorists. Glenn reveals his real power in order to rescue his students.

programme.title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records Ep04
programme.desc: With his eyes set on the special reward, Glenn aims to win the magic competition. Sistine and the others also work hard to meet his expectations.

programme.title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records Ep05
programme.desc: Rumia becomes a suspect during the competition and is targeted by the imperial guard. Glenn tries to save her but someone else stands in his way.

programme.title: A Destructive God Sits Next to Me Ep05
programme.desc: Seri gets into an accident while saving Cerberus. Kabuto and Utsugi cause a scene at Seri's new part-time job.

programme.title: A Destructive God Sits Next to Me Ep06
programme.desc: The transfer of Kimikage to Seri's class starts a war between Kimikage and Kabuto for Seri's attention and friendship.

programme.title: A Destructive God Sits Next to Me Ep07
programme.desc: Utsugi hypnotizes Suzuran during the school's cultural festival, and Kabuto learns Seri's true feelings about him.

programme.title: A Destructive God Sits Next to Me Ep08
programme.desc: Seri's reaction to Kabuto's student election speech causes Kabuto to lose his memory and change character.

programme.title: Shadows House Ep01
programme.desc: Emilico is a living Doll assigned to serve her Shadow mistress, Kate. Despite the difference in character, the pair slowly begin to warm up to each other.

programme.title: Shadows House Ep02
programme.desc: Emilico makes Kate angry, but the two soon make up before another incident leaves the Doll in shock.

programme.title: Shadows House Ep03
programme.desc: Emilico learns how aside from their cleaning duties, the primary role of Dolls are to reflect their Shadow master's expressions.

programme.title: Shadows House Ep04
programme.desc: Emilico is introduced to the Star Bearers and is also assigned alongside, Shaun and Ram to night watch for seven days.

programme.title: KAKURIYO -Bed & Breakfast for Spirits- Ep21

programme.title: Monsterland Ep03
programme.desc: A New Orleans socialite wrestles with her past.

programme.title: Schitt's Creek S6 Ep03
programme.desc: Johnny and Moira endeavour to secure an investor for a new motel, while Alexis and Ted struggle with long-distance.

programme.title: Schitt's Creek S6 Ep04
programme.desc: Moira shares the newly released Crows movie trailer with the Jazzagals. Johnny and Roland find a suspicious bag of money at the new motel.

programme.title: American Gods S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Mr. Wednesday entrusts Shadow with the Gungnir spear. Mad Sweeney recalls his journey through the ages as he awaits his promised battle. Meanwhile, Laura receives sage advice from Mama-Ji.

programme.title: American Gods S2 Ep08
programme.desc: Wednesday has disappeared and Shadow is tormented. Those that remain witness the power of New Media as she is unleashed, and the nation is enveloped in a state of panic brought on by Mr. World.

programme.title: Ray Donovan S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Ray starts to make arrangements for his family, in case he gets arrested when Kate publishes her story.Cookie gives Ray a million dollars to track down and buy a stalkerazzi video of the shooting.

programme.title: Ray Donovan S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Mickey and Daryll discover their loot is significantly less than they expected, but Mickey has a plan that sends them to the races.

programme.title: Twin Peaks S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Cooper and Truman track down the one-armed man and some strange new evidence in Laura's murder. Audrey decides to begin her own investigation, as Norma goes to a parole board hearing for her husband.

programme.title: Twin Peaks S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Tea with the Log Lady leads Cooper and Truman to discover a macabre crime scene in the woods. Meanwhile, Audrey takes a job in her dad's department store.

programme.title: Twin Peaks S1 Ep07
programme.desc: The Bookhouse Boys pay a special visit to One-Eyed Jacks, where Audrey goes undercover as a hostess.

programme.title: Black Monday S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Mo tries to keep up with Nomi but can't party like he used to.

programme.title: The Stand Ep04
programme.desc: The Boulder Free Zone Committee looks to solidify their leadership and bolster the community with a town hall meeting.

programme.title: The Stand Ep05
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, Dayna tries to get close to Flagg. In Boulder, Stu and Frannie have Harold to dinner.

programme.title: Your Honor Ep05
programme.desc: Michael attempts to return to business as usual until he discovers that someone is blackmailing him.

programme.title: Your Honor Ep06
programme.desc: Adam spends the day with a dangerous new love interest, while Michael searches for his blackmailer. Lee ramps up her involvement in Kofi's case.

programme.title: Monsterland Ep02
programme.desc: A lonely teen encounters an unwelcome guest.

programme.title: Monsterland Ep03
programme.desc: A New Orleans socialite wrestles with her past.

programme.title: Black Monday S3 Ep06
programme.desc: The group is thrust (literally) back together in a black-site interrogation turned group-therapy session.

programme.title: The Stand Ep06
programme.desc: The Trashcan Man makes his way to New Vegas while Flagg and Abigail meet for the first time.

programme.title: The Stand Ep07
programme.desc: Nadine and Harold and the Committee head separately to New Vegas, and one of each of them falls along the way.

programme.title: Your Honor Ep07
programme.desc: Michael's solution to his problem unearths deeper troubles.

programme.title: Your Honor Ep08
programme.desc: Jimmy pressures Michael over Carlos. Adam announces his future plans.

programme.title: Ray Donovan S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Ray and Mickey make a desperate attempt to get Terry released from prison.

programme.title: Ray Donovan S3 Ep04

programme.desc: Doris puts her plans in motion by visiting an old friend, and Ethan is forced to deal with being caught between two worlds after his actions contribute to a sudden death. For Love of the

programme.title: The Good Lord Bird Ep06
programme.desc: The plan to take control of Harper's Ferry, the nation's largest armory, is finally put into action.
